thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Ivan

author: Ivan
title: Ivan
text:
I like this page that brings very transparent overview of available cars in your holiday location. I just miss several things:
- when you are searching for a car, you have to search through all available car rental locations in the destination one by one - a feature is missing that would list you all available cars from all locations in the destination
- when you get back to homepage and make a new search you have to fill in all the data again - I would highly appreciate if the data from my previous search were pre-filled already
- when you get to the rentalcars.com page from another merchant (airline/hotel booking), you cannot specify your age (if below 25) and have to go through homepage again (and back to the previous problem)
